Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Bay Motel places you in the heart of Byron Bay, convenient to Wategos Beach and Cape Byron Lighthouse. This beach motel is within close proximity of Byron Bay Golf Course and Tallow Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 10 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies. 42-inch LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining
Take advantage of the motel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Take advantage of the motel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.


Make yourself at home in one of the 10 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies. 42-inch LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

A stay at Bay Motel places you in the heart of Byron Bay, convenient to Wategos Beach and Cape Byron Lighthouse. This beach motel is within close proximity of Byron Bay Golf Course and Tallow Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Wategos Beach - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Cape Byron Lighthouse - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Byron Bay Golf Course - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Tallow Beach - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Tyagarah Nature Reserve - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Kings Beach - 6.7 km / 4.1 mi
Lake Ainsworth Sport and Recreation Centre - 15.7 km / 9.7 mi
Lennox Head Surf Life Saving Club - 16.1 km / 10 mi
Ballina Golf Club - 23.8 km / 14.8 mi
Ballina Jockey Club - 23.9 km / 14.8 mi
Shelly Beach - 24.7 km / 15.4 mi
Ballina Fair Shopping Centre - 24.7 km / 15.4 mi
Lighthouse Beach - 25.4 km / 15.8 mi
Ballina Naval and Maritime Museum - 26.2 km / 16.3 mi

The preferred airport for Bay Motel is Ballina, NSW (BNK-Ballina - Byron Gateway) - 22.5 km / 14 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
